credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
title: Sampler
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
medium:
Medium; silk embroidery, wool foundation
Technique: cross, satin, tent, half-cross, and back stitches on plain weave
description: The central scene shows the Woman of Samaria at the well with Jesus. Other motifs are alphabets, vases, crowned initials, etc. Numerals in the box at the upper right are all backwards.
name: Sampler
